entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , High River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Azure 3:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: 4.1°C
Humidity: 36 %
Dewpoint: -9.6°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening. Flurries or wet flurries early this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over southern sections early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy in the evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
